name: Why didn't you call?
description:
Why didn't you call? These words repeat themselves in Theo's mind after she meets again with a one-night stand while admitted to a hospital for being attacked by a mysterious group.
She will now have to deal with the consequences of her attack, her feelings for detective Perpetva and the question. Who attacked her and why?

Why didn't you call? Is a small visual novel made for Nanoreno 2023.
